Invocation Name: affirmation daily
des:
The words we choose matter!!!

There’s value in patting yourself on the back. Positive affirmations are statements that can help brighten your outlook on the world when you say them to yourself regularly or write them down in a journal. 
Those who swear by the power of uplifting language do find that Affirmations increase their self-esteem and improve their mindset. If you're looking to form better mental health habits, this is a great—place to start.

What's more, it may help boost your overall health, too. Studies support the idea that the words we choose matter: A good positive affirmation can help you combat stress and increase the neural pathways in your brain. Other research found that saying or writing them down may foster a deeper sense of belonging. So, before those negative thoughts creep in, consider giving a few of these positive affirmations a try.

### How it works:

Step 1: Invoke the skill by saying, “Alexa, open affirmation daily”.
Step 2: Select Alexa voice. As a first-time user, Alexa will ask to select a Male or Female voice. Pick one.
Step 3: Select the number of affirmations. Next step would be selecting number of affirmations. You can select up to 6 affirmations for daily practice.
Step 4: Practice deep breathing for a few seconds.
Step 5: Alexa will share affirmations. Listen to Alexa and repeat after her two times. 

### How to change Alexa voice

Just say, 
“Alexa, I want a female voice” or
“Alexa, I would like a male voice”

### How to change a number of affirmations for practice?

Just say,
“Alexa, I want 5 affirmations” or
“Alexa, I want 2 affirmations”

### Why use this Alexa Skill?

- You will get the same affirmations for any specific day. You can invoke skill any time on a specific day and you will get same set of affirmations for that day.
- Alexa repeats each affirmation twice and provides a time for you to repeat after her.
- You can practice deep breathing before and after affirmation practice. 

We are building new features such as Daily streaks, earned badges, and custom affirmations designed by you. So start using this skill and get used to it. Make affirmations practice a daily habit and get ready for exciting new features. We will share an update soon.

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! Please consider showing your support by writing a review.
